data.lyric:
[ti:Con Calma (Remix)]
[ar:Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry/Snow]
[al:Con Calma (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Con Calma (Remix) - Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry (凯蒂·佩里)/Snow
[00:00.27]Lyrics by：Terri Moltke/Michael L. Grier/Edmond Daryll Leary/Shawn Leigh Moltke/Darrin O'Brien/Ramon Ayala/Juan Salinas/Oscar Salinas/Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson
[00:00.54]Composed by：Terri Moltke/Michael L. Grier/Edmond Daryll Leary/Shawn Leigh Moltke/Darrin O'Brien/Ramon Ayala/Juan Salinas/Oscar Salinas/Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson
[00:00.82]Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry：
[00:04.17]D-D-D-D-D-DY
[00:05.24]¡Ay Daddy!
[00:06.73]Play N' Skillz
[00:08.56]Katy Perry
[00:09.39]Run!
[00:09.83]Katy Perry：
[00:10.09]¿Cómo te llamas baby?
[00:12.29]A little mezcal got me feelin' spicy
[00:14.76]I know that we don't speak the same language
[00:17.37]But I'm gonna let my body talk for me (talk for me)
[00:20.50]Hola me llamo Katy
[00:22.47]A little mezcal got me feelin' naughty
[00:25.23]I know that we don't speak the same language
[00:27.56]So I'm gonna let my body talk for me (talk for me)
[00:30.40]Daddy Yankee：
[00:30.71]Con calma yo quiero ver como ella lo menea
[00:34.19]Mueve ese poom-poom girl
[00:35.92]Es un asesina cuando baila quiere que to' el mundo la vea
[00:39.18]I like your poom-poom girl (sube sube)
[00:40.73]Con calma yo quiero ver como ella lo menea
[00:44.45]Mueve ese poom-poom girl
[00:46.17]Tiene adrenalina en medio 'e la pista vente hazme lo que sea
[00:49.48]I like your poom-poom girl (¡hey!)
[00:51.01]Katy Perry：
[00:51.72]Dress up with my girls on the hunt tonight
[00:54.35]Got a feelin' I'ma catch a wild one
[00:56.85]I know that I'm not typically your type
[00:59.14]But you never had this kind of stimulation
[01:02.04]All eyes on me when I light up the room
[01:04.44]You play the right vibe and my body will move
[01:07.04]Easy baby I see you're in the mood
[01:09.88]Me too
[01:10.85]Katy Perry：
[01:11.41]Con calma
[01:12.80]I see you're lovin' the way I work the floor now
[01:15.05]I got the poom-poom boy
[01:16.82]You could be my Puerto Rican dream I'll be your California gurl now
[01:20.19]I got the poom-poom boy
[01:21.55]Con calma
[01:23.03]I see you're lovin' the way I work the floor now
[01:25.33]I got the poom-poom boy
[01:26.98]You could be my Puerto Rican dream I'll be your California gurl now
[01:30.39]I got the poom-poom boy
[01:31.42]Daddy Yankee：
[01:31.76]Tú tiene' candela y yo tengo la vela
[01:34.00]Llama el 911 se están quemando las suela'
[01:36.26]Me daña cuando la faldita esa me la modela
[01:39.12]Mami estás enferma pero tu show no lo cancela'
[01:41.65]Te llaman a ti la reina del party
[01:43.20]Mucha sandunga tiene ese body
[01:44.54]Tírate un paso no-no-no pare
[01:45.72]¡Wow!
[01:46.14]Dale dale (yo')
[01:47.44]Somos dos bandido' entre la rumba y romance
[01:49.93]Y zúmbale DJ otra ve' pa' que dance
[01:52.55]Échale échale échale pa'trás
[01:55.04]Échale échale pa'lante y pa'trás (ey eh ey)
[01:57.36]Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry：
[01:58.05]Con calma yo quiero ver como ella lo menea (con calma)
[02:01.16]Mueve ese poom-poom girl (girl)
[02:02.64]Es un asesina cuando baila quiere que to' el mundo la vea
[02:05.94]I like your poom-poom girl
[02:07.49]Con calma
[02:08.96]I see you're lovin' the way I work the floor now
[02:11.27]I got the poom-poom boy
[02:12.98]You could be my Puerto Rican dream I'll be your California gurl now
[02:16.29]I got the poom-poom boy
[02:17.96]Snow：
[02:18.07]Come with a nice young lady (let's go)
[02:20.11]Intelligent yes she gentle and irie (¡fuego!)
[02:22.46]Everywhere me go me never lef' her at all-ie (dile)
[02:25.07]Yes-a Daddy Snow me are the roam dance man-a (Snow)
[02:27.61]Roam between-a dancin' in-a in-a nation-a (prr-prr-prr)
[02:30.36]You never know say daddy me Snow me are the boom shakata
[02:32.86]Me never lay-a down flat in-a one cardboard box-a (¡sube sube!)
[02:35.95]Yes-a Daddy Yankee me-a go reachin' out da top (what?)
[02:38.05]Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry：
[02:38.67]Con calma yo quiero ver como ella lo menea
[02:41.88]Mueve ese poom-poom girl
[02:43.49]Es un asesina cuando baila quiere que to' el mundo la vea
[02:46.78]I like your poom-poom girl
[02:48.29]Con calma
[02:49.74]I see you're lovin' the way I work the floor now
[02:52.07]I got the poom-poom boy
[02:53.66]You could be my Puerto Rican dream I'll be your California gurl now
[02:57.10]I got the poom-poom boy

[ti:Con Calma (Remix)]
[ar:Daddy Yankee/Katy Perry/Snow]
[al:Con Calma (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权

[00:00.54]//
[00:00.82]//
[00:04.17]//
[00:05.24]//
[00:06.73]//
[00:08.56]//
[00:09.39]开始
[00:09.83]//
[00:10.09]宝贝 你叫什么名字
[00:12.29]酒精让我有点迷醉
[00:14.76]我知道我们说着不同的语言
[00:17.37]但我会让我的身体替我说话
[00:20.50]你好 我的名字是Katy
[00:22.47]酒精让我有点不守规矩
[00:25.23]我知道我们说着不同的语言
[00:27.56]所以我要让我的身体替我说话
[00:30.40]//
[00:30.71]我想静静地看她扭动妖娆的身姿
[00:34.19]扭动起来 姑娘
[00:35.92]真是摄人心魄 我要让全世界看看她美丽的舞姿
[00:39.18]我喜欢你妩媚的身姿 姑娘
[00:40.73]我想静静地看她扭动妖娆的身姿
[00:44.45]扭动起来 姑娘
[00:46.17]音乐中途她就兴奋起来了 来吧 让我看看你有什么能耐
[00:49.48]我喜欢你妩媚的身姿 姑娘
[00:51.01]//
[00:51.72]和我姐妹们悉心打扮 今晚我们要找人好好玩玩
[00:54.35]感觉我会找个一个狂野的人呢
[00:56.85]我知道我不是你的菜
[00:59.14]但你从来没有体会过这种刺激
[01:02.04]当我出现的时候 所有人都看着我
[01:04.44]你只要播放合适的音乐 我的身体就会不自觉地动起来
[01:07.04]放轻松 宝贝 我知道你兴致正好
[01:09.88]我也是呢
[01:10.85]//
[01:11.41]冷静
[01:12.80]我知道你喜欢我现在美丽的舞姿
[01:15.05]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[01:16.82]你可以做我的波多黎各梦中情人 我会做你的加州女孩
[01:20.19]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[01:21.55]冷静
[01:23.03]我知道你喜欢我现在美丽的舞姿
[01:25.33]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[01:26.98]你可以做我的波多黎各梦中情人 我会做你的加州女孩
[01:30.39]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[01:31.42]//
[01:31.76]我们热情如火
[01:34.00]快报警 这似火的热情快要淹没了我
[01:36.26]当她穿着漂亮的裙子扭动身姿 我简直心动不已
[01:39.12]姑娘 你明明很累了 但你就是不愿停下来
[01:41.65]你简直就是派对女王
[01:43.20]你的身体真是风姿绰约
[01:44.54]动起来 不要停 
[01:45.72]//
[01:46.14]来呀 来呀
[01:47.44]我们就像两个跳着浪漫舞蹈的罪犯
[01:49.93]DJ 再来一次 让她继续舞蹈
[01:52.55]退后 退后 快退后
[01:55.04]退后 退后 赶紧退后
[01:57.36]//
[01:58.05]我想静静地看她扭动妖娆的身姿
[02:01.16]扭动起来 姑娘 
[02:02.64]真是摄人心魄 我要让全世界看看她美丽的舞姿
[02:05.94]我喜欢你妩媚的身姿 姑娘
[02:07.49]冷静
[02:08.96]我知道你喜欢我现在美丽的舞姿
[02:11.27]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[02:12.98]你可以做我的波多黎各梦中情人 我会做你的加州女孩
[02:16.29]看我妩媚的身姿 男孩
[02:17.96]//
[02:18.07]那里有个年轻漂亮的女士
[02:20.11]她聪明 温柔 有魅力
[02:22.46]不管去哪里 我都不愿丢下她
[02:25.07]没错 Daddy Yankee和Snow 我们就是舞王
[02:27.61]完美的舞步 全国皆知
[02:30.36]但不亲眼见见 你是不会懂的 我Snow也能炸裂全场
[02:32.86]我们跳起舞来就从来不停歇
[02:35.95]没错Daddy Yankee要一飞冲天
[02:38.05]//
[02:38.67]我想静静地看她扭动妖娆的身姿
[02:41.88]扭动起来 姑娘

[02:48.29]冷静
[02:49.74]我知道你喜欢我现在美丽的舞姿
